# keep last 3 weeks
n = 3
# but only Saturdays and Sundays: 0 = Monday, 1 = Tuesday, ..., 6 = Sunday
keepList = [5, 6]

klnm = KeepLastN(n, keepList)


br = BackupRotation('bla', klnm, klnm, klnm, klnm)
